patterns: How can I update or correct DOB details mentioned in my policy?
Wrong DOB or Date of Birth
responses: Duly filled and signed Request For Change In Policy Details Form. Self-attested birth proof (please note that this has to be submitted within 6 months of the request and is to be attached with the form). Self-attested ID proofs such as PAN or Masked Aadhar card. You can download the form from our website: www.sbilife.co.in >> Download Center >> Policy Servicing Forms >> Request Change In Policy Details Form.

patterns: What are the premium Payment Procedures?

patterns: How can I pay premium online from MyPolicy CSS Portal?
Pay premium through MyPolicy CSS Portal
responses: Log into https://smartcare.sbilife.co.in >> Premium Payment>> Pay Premium Online. Choose from the three available payment options - Debit Card, Credit Card and Net Banking.

patterns: How can I pay premium online from the SBI Life Portal?
How to pay premium through SBI Life Portal
responses: Visit our website www.sbilife.co.in >> Pay Premium Online link. Enter your Policy Number, DOB and Mobile Number>>If Records Match ,Choose from the three available payment options - Debit Card, Credit Card and Net Banking.

patterns: What is my premium due date?

How to know the due date of my premium
responses: Visit our website www.sbilife.co.in and Log in To your account to check
Send SMS to 56161 OR 9250001848:RENDET << space >> (Policy Number)

patterns: What if I have the funds but miss the due date to pay premiums of my SBI Life-Smart Future Choices policy?
What happens if I miss paying the premium amount on the due date for the SBI Life- Smart Shield policy ?
What happens if I cannot pay my premium for the SBI Life - Smart Champ policy on the exact due date ?
What is grace period if the due date is missed?
responses: No worries,The company offers a grace period of 30 days from the premium due date for yearly, half-yearly and quarterly premium frequency and 15 days for monthly premium frequency to arrange the necessary funds for premium payment

patterns: How to select a plan the according to my needs?
What are the different plans available?
What the details of the particular plan?
responses: Visit our website www.sbilife.co.in and check Products under that click individual or group plans

patterns: How can I revive my policy
What are test requirements for the policy
responses: Corner>>Manage Your policy>>Online Revival on WhatsApp Platform
Kindly visit the nearest SBI Life branch and pay the outstanding premium with interest by cheque along with the DGH (Declaration of Good health)
You can generate the Revival Quotation from https://smartcare.sbilife.co.in >> Premium Payment >> Online Revival Transactions menu option.
